entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
